alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Tippecanoe; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 7:47AM EST until February 18 at 3:04PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Tippecanoe River at Oakdale Dam at Lake Freeman near Yeoman. .Warm temperatures caused quick melting of the snowpack. This combined with additional rainfall of over an inch on frozen ground has caused significant runoff which is producing a sharp increase in flow downstream of Oakdale Dam on the Tippecanoe River. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tippecanoe River AT Oakdale Dam at Lake Freeman near Yeoman. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EST Thursday the flow was 12200 cfs. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood flow late this morning to 13190 cfs this afternoon and rise to 14600 cfs just after midnight tonight. - Flood flow is 13000 cfs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later today.
